<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lucky Break](/Feats.aspx?ID=5553) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Cat's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=5544)

</column>

---

You are luckier even than most catfolk. You can trigger Cat's Luck when you fail or critically fail a Fortitude saving throw, Will saving throw, [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) check, or [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check in addition to Reflex saving throws. You still can use Cat's Luck only once per day.
name: Lucky Break
